SEARCH
Module com.goattechnologies.pos
Package com.goattechnologies.pos

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
com.goattechnologies.pos.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
The DatabaseManager class handles database connections, query execution, and various database operations for a Point of Sale (POS) application. It provides methods for retrieving and updating product, ingredient, and order information in the database.
Author:
Cole Broberg, Ilham Aryawan, Dinesh Balakrishnan, Mohsin Khan, Nicholas Dienstbier

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public void connect()
      Initializes the database connection. This method connects to the database using the credentials provided.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the database. This method closes the connection to the database.

    • getProductNames

      public List<String> getProductNames()
      Retrieves a list of product names from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of product names.

      Retrieves a list of add-on names from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of add-on names.

    • addOrder

      public void addOrder(List<CartItem> items, double tipPercentage)
      Adds an order to the database with the specified cart items and tip percentage.
      Parameters:
      items - The list of cart items.
      tipPercentage - The tip percentage for the order.

    • getIngredients

      public List<Ingredient> getIngredients()
      Retrieves a list of ingredients from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Ingredient objects.

    • addIngredient

      public void addIngredient(Ingredient ingredient)
      Adds a new ingredient to the database.
      Parameters:
      ingredient - The Ingredient object to be added.

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(Product product)
      Adds a new product to the database.
      Parameters:
      product - The Product object to be added.

    • updateIngredient

      public void updateIngredient(Ingredient ingredient)
      Updates an ingredient's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      ingredient - The Ingredient object with updated information.

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct(Product editedProduct)
      Updates a product's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      editedProduct - The Product object with updated information.

    • deleteIngredient

      public void deleteIngredient(int ingredientID)
      Deletes an ingredient from the database.
      Parameters:
      ingredientID - The ID of the ingredient to be deleted.

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct(int productID)
      Deletes a product from the database.
      Parameters:
      productID - The ID of the product to be deleted.

    • isManager

      public boolean isManager(int employeeID)
      Checks if an employee is a manager.
      Parameters:
      employeeID - The ID of the employee.
      Returns:
      true if the employee is a manager, false otherwise.

    • getEmployeeName

      public String getEmployeeName(int employeeID)
      Retrieves the name of an employee based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      employeeID - The ID of the employee.
      Returns:
      The name of the employee.

    • getProductIngredients

      public Array getProductIngredients(String product)
      Retrieves an array of ingredient IDs for a given product from the database.
      Parameters:
      product - The name of the product for which to retrieve ingredient IDs.
      Returns:
      An Array containing ingredient IDs for the specified product.

    • getProductsList

      public List<Product> getProductsList()
      Retrieves a list of products.
      Returns:
      A list of Product objects.

    • refreshProductCosts

      public void refreshProductCosts()
      Refreshes the product costs in the database.

    • getIngredientNameByID

      public String getIngredientNameByID(int ingredientId)
      Retrieves the name of an ingredient by its ID.
      Parameters:
      ingredientId - The ID of the ingredient.
      Returns:
      The name of the ingredient, or "Ingredient not found" if not found.

    • getDrinks

      public HashMap<Integer,String> getDrinks()
      Retrieves a map of drinks where the key is the product ID and the value is the product name.
      Returns:
      A map of drinks.

    • getMultiOrders

      public List<List<Integer>> getMultiOrders(Timestamp startTime, Timestamp endTime)
      Retrieves a list of multi-orders within a specified time range.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start time for the time range.
      endTime - The end time for the time range.
      Returns:
      A list of lists, where each inner list contains the product IDs of multi-orders.

    • getPopularity

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getPopularity(Timestamp startTime, Timestamp endTime, Integer numItems)
      Retrieves a Map of a ProductNames with their Popularity within a specified time range for a specific number of items.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start time for the time range.
      endTime - The end time for the time range.
      numItems - The number of items for which we limit the query to
      Returns:
      A Map of ProductName with its respective Popularity in terms of how often it was ordered

    • getSalesByItem

      public HashMap<String,Integer> getSalesByItem(Timestamp startTime, Timestamp endTime)
      Retrieves a Map of all the products and the total sales prices for each product within a specified time range.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The start time for the time range.
      endTime - The end time for the time range.
      Returns:
      A Map of ProductName with its respective Total Sales Price
